summary: Mohamed Abdelwahab  is a former Egyptian football player.
full_text: Mohamed Abdelwahab  was an Egyptian footballer. He played in the defensive left back position. He was an important part of the Egyptian squad that went on to win the 2006 African Cup of Nations. He died during training with his club El Ahly on 31 August 2006.
title: Mohamed Abdelwahab
